title: Principle of Management & Organization
author: Dr. Pedrito R. Pereda & Dr. Purisima P. Pereda
description: This book provides a comprehensive guide on management theories, organizational structures, and leadership strategies crucial for technical and livelihood educators.

title: Learning and Living in the 21st Century: Worktext in Technology and Livelihood Education 8
author: Leonora D. Basbas, Belen M. Jamisal, Ma. Luz R. Lebrudo
description: This worktext provides comprehensive coverage of technology and livelihood education topics, focusing on practical applications and skills essential for 21st-century learners.

title: III-Nitride Based Light Emitting Diodes and Applications (2nd Edition)
author: Tae-Yeon Seong
description: This book delves into the development and applications of III-nitride semiconductors in light-emitting diodes, offering insights into materials science and electronic device engineering.

title: Introduction to Light Emitting Diode Technology and Applications
author: Gilbert Held
description: This book introduces the fundamentals of LED technology, exploring various applications and providing a solid foundation for understanding modern lighting solutions.

title: Teaching Technologies in Nursing and the Health Professions: Beyond Simulation and Online Courses
author: Katherine Vogel Smith
description: This book discusses the integration of technology in teaching, focusing on innovative methods beyond traditional simulation and online courses, applicable to various educational fields.
